variables.input:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`
| fields tags
| summarize tags = collectDistinct(tags)

0.title: PaloAlto firewalls
0.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.cpu.management.utilization`), t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.sys.uptime`),
by: {`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device` | fields id, SystemName, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ SystemName,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=toLong(arrayAvg(`t_cpu`)), avg_upt=arrayLast(`t_upt`)

| lookup [timeseries t_ino=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.hc.in.octets`,rate:1s), t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.hc.out.octets`,rate:1s), 
by: {`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`}, interval:1m
| fieldsAdd `InOs` = tolong(8*arrayAvg(t_ino)), `OutOs` = tolong(8*arrayAvg(t_outo))
| summarize `In Traffic`= sum(InOs),`Out Traffic` = sum(OutOs),by:{`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
    fields:{`In Traffic`, `Out Traffic` }  

| lookup sourceField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]

| fields lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, SystemName, avg_cpu, `In Traffic`, `Out Traffic`
| fieldsRename `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| fieldsRemove avg_upt
| filter SystemName != "DUMSYS-10"
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = SystemName, `System Up Time` = DurSys ,`CPU utilization` = avg_cpu, `Last seen` = lifetime
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( `Last seen`  <  now() - 10m, "⚠️",else:"✅")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` , `Problems #`,`CPU utilization`, `Out Traffic`, `In Traffic`
| sort `Problems #` desc

6.title: Cisco switches and routers
6.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.loadavg.5min`), t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.free`),  t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.sys.uptime`), 
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, system_name, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{system_name,`lifetime[end]`}
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=arrayAvg(`t_cpu`), avg_mem=arrayAvg(`t_mem`), avg_upt=arrayLast(`t_upt`)

| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`, rate:1s), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`, rate:1s), 
by:{ `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}, interval:1m
| fieldsAdd `InOs` = 8*tolong(arrayAvg(t_in)), `OutOs` = 8*tolong(arrayAvg(t_out))
| summarize `In Traffic`= sum(InOs),`Out Traffic` = sum(OutOs),by:{`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    fields:{`In Traffic`,`Out Traffic`}  
    
| lookup sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields Device = system_name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, system_name, avg_mem, avg_cpu,`In Traffic`,`Out Traffic`
| fieldsRename `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| fieldsRemove avg_upt
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `System Up Time` = DurSys , `CPU utilization` = avg_cpu, `Free Memory (KB)` = avg_mem
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( lifetime <  now() -10m, "⚠️",else:"✅")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` ,  `Problems #`, `CPU utilization`, `Free Memory (KB)`, `Out Traffic`, `In Traffic`
| filter `DNS name` != "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| sort `Problems #` desc

8.title: Interfaces in Up/Down state
8.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd description,type,  opStatus, adminStatus
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`] ,
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id, entity.name
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_system_name,Interface=description
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" AND adminStatus == "up(1)"
| fieldsRemove opStatus,adminStatus

| append [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd Name, Status,EnabledState
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`],
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id, entity.name
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_NodeName,Interface=Name,opStatus=Status,adminStatus=EnabledState
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" AND adminStatus == "true(1)"
| fieldsRemove opStatus,adminStatus]

| append [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`
| fieldsAdd InterfaceDescription, IFOperatingStatus, InterfaceAdminStatus
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`| fields id, SystemName],
    sourceField:runs_on[`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`],
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id, entity.name
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_SystemName,Interface=InterfaceDescription, opStatus=IFOperatingStatus,adminStatus=InterfaceAdminStatus
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" AND adminStatus == "up(1)"
| fieldsRemove opStatus,adminStatus]

| append [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd entity.name,  if_adminstatus, if_operstatus
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`],
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_system_name, Interface=entity.name, opStatus=if_operstatus,adminStatus=if_adminstatus
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" AND adminStatus == "up(1)"
| fieldsRemove opStatus,adminStatus]

| append [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`
| fieldsAdd description,  adminStatus, opStatus
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`],
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_system_name, Interface=description
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" AND adminStatus == "up(1)"
| fieldsRemove opStatus,adminStatus]

| filter `DNS name`  != ""

18.title: Top interfaces Inbound load
18.query:
timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`,rate:1s),  t_speed=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.highspeed`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}, interval:1m
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove   `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `InLoad`=  8*100*t_ino[]/(power(10, 6)*tolong(t_speed[]))
| fieldsAdd SumLoad = arraySum(`InLoad`)

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`,rate:1s),  t_speed=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-device.if.highspeed`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`}, interval:1m
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `InLoad`=  8*100*t_ino[]/(power(10, 6)*tolong(t_speed[]))
| fieldsAdd SumLoad = arraySum(`InLoad`)]

| sort SumLoad desc
| limit 10
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_ino,t_speed,SumLoad

19.title: Top interfaces Outbound load
19.query:
timeseries t_ouo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`, rate:1s),  t_speed=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.highspeed`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`},interval:1m
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove   `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `OutLoad`= 8*100*t_ouo[]/(power(10, 6)*tolong(t_speed[]))
| fieldsAdd SumLoad = arraySum(`OutLoad`)

| append [timeseries t_ouo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`, rate:1s),  t_speed=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-device.if.highspeed`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`},interval:1m
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `OutLoad`=  8*100*t_ouo[]/(power(10, 6)*tolong(t_speed[]))
| fieldsAdd SumLoad = arraySum(`OutLoad`)]

| sort SumLoad desc
| limit 10
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_ouo,t_speed,SumLoad

20.title: Top interfaces traffic
20.query:
timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`,rate:1s), t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`,rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`},interval:1m
| fieldsAdd `In Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_ino)*8), `Out Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_outo)*8)
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=description
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In Traffic`, `Out Traffic` 

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.bits`),  t_outo=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.bits`),
by: { `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`},interval:1m
| fieldsAdd `In Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_ino)), `Out Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_outo))
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`| fields id,entity.name , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ entity.name, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=entity.name
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In Traffic`, `Out Traffic` ]

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.octets`,rate:1s), t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.octets`,rate:1s),
by:{`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`},interval:1m
| fieldsAdd `In Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_ino)*8), `Out Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_outo)*8)
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`| fields id,InterfaceDescription, runs_on[`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`]] ,
    sourceField: `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  InterfaceDescription, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`| fields id, SystemName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ SystemName } 
| filter SystemName != "DUMSYS-10"
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = SystemName,Interface=InterfaceDescription
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In Traffic`, `Out Traffic` ]

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`,rate:1s), t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`,rate:1s),
by:{`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`},interval:1m
| fieldsAdd `In Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_ino)*8), `Out Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_outo)*8)
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`| fields id, description, child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`]] ,
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name } 
| filter system_name != "DUMSYS-10"
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=description
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In Traffic`, `Out Traffic`]

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`,rate:1s),  t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`,rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.f5:interface`},interval:1m
| fieldsAdd `In Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_ino)*8), `Out Traffic` = tolong(arrayAvg(t_outo)*8)
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`| fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = NodeName,Interface=Name
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In Traffic`, `Out Traffic` ]
| filter `DNS name` != ""
| sort `In Traffic`+ `Out Traffic` desc
| limit 10

21.title: Top interfaces discards and errors
21.query:
timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.discards`,rate:1s),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.discards`,rate:1s),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.errors`,rate:1s),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.errors`,rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`},interval:1m
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=description
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors

| append [timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.drops.in.count`,rate:1s),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.drops.out.count`,rate:1s),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.errors.in.count`,rate:1s),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.errors.out.count`,rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.f5:interface`},interval:1m
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.f5:interface` | fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField: `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }

32.title: F5 BIG-IP load balancers
32.query:
timeseries t_cpuu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.user1m`),
t_cpui=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.idle1m`),
t_cpuw=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.iowait1m`),
t_cpur=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.irq1m`),
t_cpuf=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.softirq1min`),
by: {`dt.entity.f5:instance`}
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu1=arrayAvg(`t_cpuu`)+arrayAvg(`t_cpui`)+arrayAvg(`t_cpuw`)+arrayAvg(`t_cpur`)+arrayAvg(`t_cpuf`)
| fieldsRemove t_cpuu,t_cpui,t_cpuw,t_cpur,t_cpuf
| lookup [ timeseries   t_cpus=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.stolen1m`),t_cput=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.system1m`),
t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.host.memory.used`),  t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.uptime`),
by: {`dt.entity.f5:instance`}| fieldsAdd avg_cpu2=arrayAvg(`t_cpus`)+arrayAvg(`t_cput`),avg_mem=arrayAvg(`t_mem`), avg_upt=arrayLast(`t_upt`) | fieldsRemove t_cpus,t_cput,t_mem,t_upt],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    fields:{avg_cpu2,avg_mem,avg_upt}
 | fieldsAdd avg_cpu=  avg_cpu1+avg_cpu2 
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance` | fields id, entity.name, NodeName, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,NodeName,`lifetime[end]`}   

| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`,rate:1s), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`,rate:1s), 
by:{ `dt.entity.f5:instance`,`dt.entity.f5:interface`}, interval:1m
| fieldsAdd `InOs` = 8*tolong(arrayAvg(t_in)), `OutOs` = 8*tolong(arrayAvg(t_out))
| summarize `In Traffic`= sum(InOs),`Out Traffic` = sum(OutOs),by:{`dt.entity.f5:instance`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    fields:{`In Traffic`,`Out Traffic`}  
| lookup sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields Device = NodeName, `dt.entity.f5:instance`, name=entity.name, lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, NodeName, avg_mem, avg_cpu, `In Traffic`,`Out Traffic`
| fieldsRename `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsRemove `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| filter NodeName != "ip-10-0-11-88.ec2.internal"
| fieldsRename `DNS name`= NodeName, `System Up Time` = DurSys , `CPU utilization` = avg_cpu, `Free Memory` = avg_mem
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( lifetime <  now() -10m, "⚠️",else:"✅")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` ,  `Problems #`, `CPU utilization`, `Free Memory`, `Out Traffic`, `In Traffic`

36.title: Cisco routers and switches Power  Supply state

| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)

|append[fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`

 [fetch events

| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]

|append[fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)

|append[fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`

39.title: Interface desired status
39.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd   opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" and adminStatus == "up(1)"
| summarize updown=count()

| fieldsAdd  Status,EnabledState
| filter Status == "down(2)" and EnabledState == "up(1)"
| fieldsRename  opStatus=Status,adminStatus=EnabledState

| append [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`
| fieldsAdd  IFOperatingStatus, InterfaceAdminStatus
| filter IFOperatingStatus == "down(2)" and InterfaceAdminStatus =="up(1)"

| append [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd Status,EnabledState
| filter Status == "down(1)" AND EnabledState == "true(1)"

| append [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device_interface`

| filter opStatus == "down(2)" and adminStatus == "up(1)"
| summarize updown=count()]

41.title: Network devices hardware health
41.query:
timeseries t_fs=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.envmon.fan.state`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,envmon.fan.status,envmon.fan.status.descr}
| fieldsAdd LastFanState=arraylast(`t_fs`)
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }   
| filter LastFanState == 1 and isnotnull( envmon.fan.status.descr) and  envmon.fan.status ==  "critical(3)"   
| filter system_name == "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| summarize HHealth=count()
|append [timeseries t_ps=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.power_supply.state`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,ps.label, ps.status}
| fieldsAdd LastPSUState=arraylast(`t_ps`)
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| filter LastPSUState == 1 and isnotnull(ps.label) and ps.status ==  "critical(3)"  
| filter system_name != "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| summarize HHealth=count()]
| summarize critical=sum(HHealth)
| fieldsAdd `Hardware`=  if(critical==0,  "🟢",else: "🔴")

43.title: Top devices  memory usage
43.query:
timeseries t_free=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.free`), t_used=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.used`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{system_name}
| fieldsadd `Used Memory (%)` = 100*(t_used[]/(t_free[]+ t_used[]))
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name
| fieldsRemove  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,t_free,t_used

| append [timeseries t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.routingengine.memory.utilization`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device` | fields id,  system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{system_name}
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `Used Memory (%)` = t_mem
| fieldsRemove `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`]

| append [timeseries t_used=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.host.memory.used`),t_free=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.host.memory.free`),
by: {`dt.entity.f5:instance`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance` | fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{NodeName}
| fieldsadd `Used Memory (%)` = 100*(t_used[]/(t_free[]+ t_used[]))
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=NodeName
| fieldsRemove  `dt.entity.f5:instance`,t_used,t_free]
| sort `Used Memory (%)` desc
| limit 10

45.title: Juniper routers

timeseries  t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.device.sys.uptime`),t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.routingengine.cpu.utilization`),t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.routingengine.memory.utilization`),

 [fetch events

| fields Device = system_name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, system_name, `Out Traffic`, `In Traffic`, avg_mem, avg_cpu
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*10000000
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `System Up Time` = DurSys ,  `CPU utilization` = avg_cpu, `Memory utilization` = avg_mem, `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( lifetime <  now() - 10m, "⚠️",else:"✅")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` ,  `Problems #`, `CPU utilization`, `Memory utilization`, `Out Traffic`, `In Traffic`
| sort `Problems #` desc
